summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the installation of street improvements consisting of a storm sewer in and the regrading and paving of the alley in Block 8, Burke & Farrar's Columbia Park Addition to the City of Seattle, recorded in Vol. 18 of plats, page 25, Records of King County, Washington, authorizing the Director of Transportation to execute an assessment reimbursement agreement with the owner of Lots 16-18 in said Block 8 for the cost of said improvements, and determining the assessment reimbursement area and the pro rata shares of the adjacent properties benefited by the street improvements, and setting a period of fifteen years during which partial reimbursements from the benefited properties may be collected.
